92.title: Aakash accepts Roongta's offer
92.plot: On Sameer's suggestion, Roongta asks Aakash to climb the Everest for Century Corp. Aakash accepts Roongta's offer.

93.title: Abhyankar Remembers Tara
93.plot: Colonel Abhyankar and Anjali are dejected upon seeing dead bodies while climbing the Everest. Meanwhile, Sameer informs Rena that the climbers have less oxygen with them.

94.title: Conquered: The Southern Peak!
94.plot: Chaand and Colonel are dejected recalling Tara. Meanwhile, Sameer informs Roongta about Tara's death. Colonel informs Roongta that they have reached the Southern summit of Everest.

95.title: Colonel Refuses to Go Ahead
95.plot: Colonel Abhyankar refuses to go ahead and asks Chaand to lead the expedition. Sameer informs Roongta that Colonel is returning. Roongta asks Aakash to search for the crown accessory and bring it to him.

96.title: Anjali motivates Aakash
96.plot: Maithili tells Sarita about the live telecast of Anjali's Everest expedition. Anjali tries to motivate Aakash. Later, Aakash agrees to bring the crown accessory as Roongta threatens to abort the mission.

97.title: Chaand Breathes His Last!
97.plot: Jagat and Sarita are worried learning that the base camp has lost contact with Chaand, Aakash and Anjali. Meanwhile, Chaand gets injured during the ascent.

98.title: Chaand's Death Saddens Colonel
98.plot: Aakash tells Anjali that he will bring Chaand's oxygen cylinders. Colonel Abhyankar is shattered to know about Chaand's death. Aakash informs Colonel Abhyankar about Chaand hanging from a rope. Colonel Abhyankar asks Aakash to cut it.

99.title: Aakash-Anjali Cross Hillary Step
99.plot: On Colonel's insistence, Aakash cuts Chaand's rope. Aakash tells Anjali that they must conquer Everest for Chaand's sake. Later, Aakash informs Sameer that they have crossed Hillary Step and are moving ahead.

100.title: Nasir confronts Roongta
100.plot: Maithli is worried about revealing her relationship with Vidhan to Jagat and Sarita. Meanwhile, Sameer informs Roongta about Aakash and Anjali crossing the Hillary Step. Anjali recalls Jagat while climbing Everest.

101.title: Anjali Conquers the Everest!
101.plot: Anjali is delighted reaching the Everest. A delighted Sameer congratulates Aakash and Anjali. Meanwhile, Jagat, Sarita and Shikha are proud of Anjali's achievement. The duo profess their love to each other.

102.title: Akash Finds the Treasured Pendant
102.plot: The team celebrate the success of conquering Everest. The duo share a special moment at the peak. Akash finds the treasured pendant. Anjali and Akash celebrate with their families and are felicitated by the President of India.

1.title: Anjali Does Not Attend Her Felicitation Ceremony
1.plot: Aakash is given an assignment - to prepare a documentary on a mountaineer. Anjali's father refuses to attend her felicitation ceremony as he had wanted a son. Hence, Anjali does not attend the ceremony either.

2.title: Aakash accepts the assignment
2.plot: Desperate times call for desperate measures, so Aakash accepts the assignment of covering a mountaineer's journey up the Everest in spite of his fear of heights. Is he risking too much?

3.title: Jagat Decides to Get Anjali Married to Vidhaan
3.plot: Jagat decides to get Anjali married to Vidhaan, who is in the Indian Army. Ramesh Roongta and Arjun hide the actual plan from Aakash. Vidhaan's family visits Anjali's house. Will Anjali agree to marry Vidhaan?

4.title: Ramesh Roongta Launches His New Company, 'Century Corp'
4.plot: Ramesh Roongta briefs everyone about his company's brand ambassador Arjun's Mount Everest expedition. Meanwhile, Aakash consults a psychiatrist regarding his fear of heights. Will Aakash complete his mission in spite of his shortcomings?

5.title: Anjali Joins the Mountaineering Course
5.plot: Anjali informs Maithili that she wants to go for Everest expedition to fulfill her father's dream Later, Anjali informs Sarita that she wants to join the mountaineering course in NIM. Will Anjali succeed in fulfilling her father's dream?

6.title: Sarita misleads Jagat about Anjali's plan to NIM
6.plot: Jagat informs Sarita that Vidhaan has agreed to marry Anjali. However, Sarita manages to mislead Jagat and allows Anjali to join the mountaineering course. Later, at the airport, Anjali is shocked to see Jagat.

7.title: Anjali leaves for Uttar Kashi
7.plot: Maithili helps Anjali slip out of Jagat's notice and leave for Uttar Kashi. Meanwhile, Ramesh Roongta tries to get Arjun to realize his responsibilities and assures him that Colonel Abhyankar will lead the expedition.

8.title: Anjali's admission to NIM
8.plot: Anjali reaches Nehru Institute of Mountaineering (NIM) for her Everest expedition. Ramesh Roongta informs Arjun that the PN TV is sending their best reporter to cover his Everest expedition.

9.title: Colonel Abhyankar Says Yes
9.plot: Anjali jumps over Abhyankar's house gates to meet him. She explains the reason for her delay in reaching NIM and the Colonel makes an exception. Roongta requests Abhyankar to lead Arjun's Everest expedition, which he refuses.

10.title: Arjun Shares His Experience
10.plot: Girish and Gopal give the students a campus tour of NIM. Arjun shares his experience of the Kanchenjunga expedition with everyone. Manasi informs everyone of Anjali's efforts to join the NIM.

11.title: Teams Are Formed, Lines Are Drawn
11.plot: Kabir introduces himself to the students. Colonel Abhyankar informs the students about their training instructors, Subhedar Avasthi and Rana. He announces a scholarship worth Rs. 10 lakh to the most promising student.

12.title: Colonel Starts to Train Arjun
12.plot: The Mountain Rockers team and the Black Horse team lock horns with each other. Arjun starts training under Colonel Abhyankar. Which team will conquer the pinnacle first?

13.title: Raman Is Made Fun Of
13.plot: Pari locks the Mountain Rockers in their rooms but they manage to reach the training session right on time. The Students start their training. Will the Mountain Rockers team be able to make the Black Horse team realize their mistake?

14.title: Aakash gets expelled
14.plot: Things get out of hand when Raman requires medical attention. Aakash, Siraj and Vicky get Raman admitted to a hospital. Will Aakash be able to prove his innocence to Colonel Abhyankar?

15.title: Raman's Confession
15.plot: The Mountain Rockers team is delighted as Aakash wins the basketball match against Kabir. A dejected Raman apologizes to Aakash for his mistake and informs him that he has revealed the truth to Colonel Abhyankar.

16.title: Anjali helps Aakash
16.plot: Aakash gets vertigo while climbing the outdoor wall and Anjali tries to calm him. Colonel Abhyankar praises Anjali for her leadership skills.

17.title: Anjali Feels Guilty
17.plot: Anjali feels guilty about lying to Jagat about the Everest expedition. Later, Colonel Abhyankar briefs the students about the guidelines for the Everest expedition. What awaits our daredevils?

18.title: Siraj Delays the Black Horse Team
18.plot: Colonel Abhyankar informs the students that they will be trained in survival skills and climbing techniques.

19.title: Anjali apologises to Pari
19.plot: Anjali tries to mend the fences between the two teams and apologizes to Pari. Later, Anjali falls down whilst rock climbing. Upon inspection, Avasthi comes to a conclusion that Anjali's rope was tampered.

20.title: Aakash argues with Arjun
20.plot: A furious Aakash argues with Arjun for insulting Anjali, which leads to an altercation between them. Aakash apologizes to Colonel Abhyankar and Arjun for his mistake.

21.title: Rana Punishes the Students
21.plot: Nirmal reveals that Kabir has tampered with Anjali's rope. A fight breaks out between the Mountain Rockers team and the Black Horse team.

22.title: Anjali and Aakash help Yohan
22.plot: The Black Horse team wins the competition. Kabir and Pari try to justify their decision. Will Kabir realize his mistake?

23.title: Aakash rescues Kabir
23.plot: Aakash tells Anjali about his parents' death in a car accident. Later, Kabir slips off the cliff but Aakash rescues him. He realizes his mistake and informs Abhyankar that Aakash has rescued him. Will Aakash be able to overcome his vertigo?

24.title: Mr. Roongta rebukes Aakash
24.plot: Colonel Abhyankar refuses to lead Arjun's Everest expedition. Later, an infuriated Mr. Roongta rebukes Aakash for refusing to accompany Arjun. Will Aakash agree to go with Arjun?

25.title: Colonel's Deal with Mr. Roongta
25.plot: Anjali reveals to Colonel Abhyankar that she wants to fulfill Jagat's dream by scaling Mt Everest. Later, Abhyankar informs Roongta that he will lead Arjun's Everest expedition if Roongta sponsors Anjali's expedition too.

26.title: Shikha's Critical Health
26.plot: Aakash assures Shikha that he will arrange the money for her surgery and requests Mr. Roongta to allow him to accompany Arjun on the expedition. Will Mr. Roongta agree?

27.title: Aakash apologises to Mr. Roongta
27.plot: Jagat informs Sarita about Anjali's proposed marriage with Vidhan. Later, Aakash apologizes to Roongta for his mistake and requests him for permission to accompany Arjun on the Everest expedition. Will Roongta agree?

28.title: Arjun's Criminal Record
28.plot: Jagat and Vikram discuss Anjali's proposed marriage with Vidhan. Pratap informs Mr. Roongta about Arjun's family background and his criminal record. Will Mr. Roongta forgive Arjun for lying to him?

29.title: Mr. Roongta confronts Arjun
29.plot: Dr. Aman informs Aakash that they need his consent letter for Shikha's surgery. Anjali informs Vidhan about her Everest expedition and requests him to postpone their engagement. Will Vidhan oblige?

30.title: Seema berates Aakash
30.plot: Anjali and Sarita lie to Jagat that Maithili is getting married and unaware of Anjali's Everest expedition, Jagat allows her to attend Maithili's supposed marriage in Delhi.

31.title: Chaand joins the expedition team
31.plot: Aakash and Anjali are elated to see each other at the airport. Roongta asks Arjun to forget about his past and focus on the expedition. The Colonel introduces Chaand to the team and Roongta is surprised at Chaand's plan for the expedition.

32.title: Arjun Shares His Miseries
32.plot: Arjun shares his fears with Aakash and Anjali and talks about his Nandadevi expedition. Aakash, Anjali, Arjun and Chaand reach Lukla. Colonel Abhyankar introduces Sirdar Tashi, Pasang, Nima and Dorji to the team.

33.title: Arjun apologises to Anjali
33.plot: Aakash feels guilty for not informing his team about his vertigo. Later, Colonel Abhyankar informs his team about a memorial of people that failed their Everest expedition. Will they succeed theirs?

34.title: The team goes to Kala Pathar
34.plot: Mohit, an expedition leader informs Colonel Abhyankar that they cannot continue with the expedition due to bad weather. The Colonel suggests going to Kala Pathar instead, to witness the majestic Mount Everest. Will the team scale Everest?

35.title: Anjali's Marriage Plans
35.plot: Colonel Abhyankar introduces the base camp manager, Lisa Adams, to his team. Jagat and Sarita discuss Anjali's wedding with Vidhan. Will Jagat learn about Anjali's Everest expedition?

36.title: The Team Needs a Weather Expert
36.plot: Anjali struggles to trek with the help of crutches, but Abhyankar manages to keep her spirits up. Abhyankar decides to cancel the expedition as the team does not have a weather expert. Will the team be able to find one in time?

37.title: Sameer Confronts the Colonel
37.plot: Mr. Roongta informs Sameer that he is sponsoring the expedition and introduces him to the team. Later, Sarita informs Maithili that Jagat is insisting that Anjali return home.

38.title: Sameer Decides to Leave the Team
38.plot: An infuriated Sameer confronts Colonel Abhyankar for interfering in his work and decides to leave the team. Roongta asks Abhyankar to apologize to Sameer for his mistake.

39.title: Jagat confronts Sarita
39.plot: Colonel Abhyankar and his team are frightened to see a footprint resembling the Yeti's. Meanwhile, Jagat learns about Anjali's Everest expedition from the news. He confronts Sarita for lying to him and accuses her of deceiving him.

40.title: Vikram and Vidhan Praise Anjali
40.plot: An infuriated Jagat confronts Sarita and asks her to call Anjali back home. Meanwhile, Vikram and Vidhan praise Anjali for her Everest expedition. Roongta informs his team about their expedition being broadcast on television.

41.title: Jagat Asks Anjali to Return Home
41.plot: Arjun informs Chaand that he wants to summit Everest without the oxygen cylinder, but Colonel Abhyankar refuses to allow him. Later, Anjali apologizes to Jagat for lying to him. Jagat asks Anjali to return home.

42.title: Anjali apologises to Aakash
42.plot: An infuriated Jagat asks Anjali to return home, but she refuses to do so before completing her Everest expedition. Obliging to Nasir's request, Phurba answers Anjali's questions about the Yeti.

43.title: Aakash spies on Yeti
43.plot: Aakash is curious about Yeti and decides to learn the truth behind the mystery. Later, Anjali finds him unconscious..

44.title: Nasir confronts Phurba
44.plot: An infuriated Nasir confronts Phurba for his misdeed. Phurba then shares his miseries with Colonel Abhyankar and Nasir's team. Later, Colonel Abhyankar asks the team to keep the news of the hidden from the media.

45.title: Jagat Wants Anjali Home
45.plot: Phurba thanks Aakash for making him realize his mistake. Later, Nasir gifts a chain to Aakash. Jagat asks Colonel Abhyankar to send Anjali back home but he politely declines. Will Jagat accept Anjali's decision to summit Mount Everest?

46.title: Roongta Has an Agenda
46.plot: Nasir rebukes Roongta on learning of his real motive behind sponsoring the Everest expedition. Nasir and his team leave for their expedition. What is Roongta's hidden agenda?

47.title: Sameer refuses Roongta's offer
47.plot: Rena tells Anjali about her past relationship with Arjun. Meanwhile, Mr. Roongta offers more money to Sameer to start the expedition sooner, but Sameer refuses. Will the Colonel learn about Roongta's motive behind sponsoring the expedition?

48.title: Chaand informs Lisa about Namgyar
48.plot: Colonel Abhyankar and Chaand inform Sameer that they were in the Namche police station for a day. Later, Chaand informs Sameer and Lisa about a kid, Namgyar, who wanted to accompany them on the Everest expedition.

49.title: Arjun apologises to Anjali
49.plot: A dejected Arjun reveals to Anjali about his past life. Arjun apologizes to Anjali for his mistake. The Namche police arrest Colonel Abhyankar and Chaand for abducting Namgyar.

50.title: Arjun's Tragic Past
50.plot: Tashi informs Aakash that the police have arrested his team. A dejected Arjun recalls his time spent in jail. Later, Arjun answers Rina's questions. Aakash informs Anjali about the reason behind Gaurav's death.

51.title: Colonel Advances the Expedition
51.plot: Shikha confronts Seema for blaming Aakash for Gaurav's death. Meanwhile, Sameer informs the Colonel about the changes in weather and suggests rescheduling their Everest expedition. the Colonel advances the expedition accordingly.

52.title: Jagat's Request to Colonel Abhyankar
52.plot: Jagat requests Colonel Abhyankar to send Anjali back home. Later, Anjali asks Aakash about Gaurav and asks him to not feel guilty about his death. Later, Chaand shares his experiences from his previous Everest expedition.

53.title: Colonel Confronts Sameer
53.plot: Nasir's teammate Eon informs Colonel Abhyankar about the bad weather and the storm. Colonel Abhyankar confronts Sameer for his negligence towards work. Chaand suggests canceling the expedition.

54.title: Rena Expresses Her Feelings
54.plot: Chaand informs Arjun that Colonel Abhyankar asked him to accompany the rescue team. Meanwhile, Anjali requests Colonel Abhyankar to allow her to accompany their rescue team, but he refuses.

55.title: Sarita confronts Jagat
55.plot: Sameer tells Colonel Abhyankar that they need eight climbers to rescue Nasir and his teammates. Arjun tells Mr. Roongta about Anjali's expulsion. Colonel Abhyankar decides to include Aakash in his rescue team.

56.title: Sarita tries to motivate Anjali
56.plot: Roongta asks Arjun to bring the crown. the Colonel and his team climb to rescue Nasir and his teammates. Sarita tries to motivate Anjali. The Colonel informs Aakash about the reason for Anjali's expulsion.

57.title: Colonel Abhyankar Confronts Arjun
57.plot: Aakash is scared to cross the Khumbu valley. Anjali tells Rena about her marriage to Vidhan. Aakash tells Anjali about their narrow escape. Colonel Abhyankar confronts Arjun. Vidhan expresses his feelings to Maithili.

58.title: Sameer Tries to Contact Colonel
58.plot: Roongta confronts Rena about her hidden agenda against him. Later, the Colonel tries to motivate Aakash while crossing one of the troughs of Khumbu glacier.

59.title: Nima Dies While Crossing Khumbu
59.plot: Colonel Abhyankar and his team try to rescue Nima but in vain. Nima dies while crossing one of Khumbu's troughs. Later, a dejected Colonel Abhyankar informs Sameer about Nima's death.

60.title: Nima Kakuli Dies; Anjali Carries On
60.plot: Colonel Abhyankar decides to keep the rescue team moving even after Nima's death. Brigadier Jagat Singh Rawat asks Sameer to send Anjali back home. Meanwhile, Anjali tries to cross the trough where Nima fell to his death.

61.title: Anjali Crosses the Trough
61.plot: Sameer confronts Roongta for accessing his system without authorization and changing the weather report. Later, Sameer informs the colonel about the poor weather conditions.

62.title: Colonel Decides to Go Ahead
62.plot: Due to unpredictable weather conditions, Colonel Abhyankar is unsure about going ahead. Meanwhile, Naseer communicates that his team is alive but their oxygen supply is low. Colonel Abhyankar decides to go ahead with the rescue mission.

63.title: Vidhan confronts Jagat
63.plot: Colonel Abhyankar and his rescue team reach camp one. Meanwhile, Chaand informs Aakash that Anjali likes him. Jagat is shattered as Vidhan refuses to marry Anjali. Vidhan confronts Jagat for his behavior towards Anjali.

64.title: Colonel's Team Falls Into a Well
64.plot: Colonel confronts Roongta about tampering with Sameer's computer. Later, the Colonel tries to rescue his teammates as they are left clinging to a rope after falling into a well. Will the Colonel and Anjali be able to rescue their team?

65.title: Anjali Rescues Her Teammates
65.plot: Colonel Abhyankar and Anjali succeed in rescuing their teammates. Colonel Abhyankar confronts Anjali for leaving the base camp without informing Sameer. Later, he asks her to accompany the rescue team.

66.title: Jagat confronts Sameer
66.plot: Jagat confronts Sameer on learning that Anjali is with the rescue team. Meanwhile, the team praise Anjali for her efforts to save them. Shikha is delighted that Anjali rescued Aakash and his team. Will Jagat realize that Anjali a the hero?

67.title: Vikram apologises to Jagat
67.plot: Anjali stops Aakash from expressing his feelings to her. Meanwhile, an angry Vikram confronts Vidhan for refusing to marry Anjali. Later, Vidhan realizes his mistake and agrees to marry Anjali.

68.title: Mr. Roongta threatens Arjun
68.plot: Sameer reports to the Colonel about a storm headed towards them. The Colonel informs his team that they will have to climb faster in order to rescue Nasir and his team. Meanwhile, Roongta threatens to reveal Arjun's past, on television.

69.title: Sarita confronts Jagat
69.plot: Mr. Roongta threatens to reveal Arjun's past on television if he fails to bring the crown accessory. Meanwhile, Nasir tries to motivate his teammates. Sarita confronts Jagat for hiding the truth about Vidhan's refusal to marry Anjali.

70.title: Colonel's Team Gets Stuck in Ice
70.plot: Chaand suggests to Colonel Abhyankar that they should take a long break. The colonel warns his teammates about avalanches. Colonel Abhyankar and his team get stuck in ice. Later, Colonel Abhyankar and Chaand search for their team.

71.title: Shikha misses Akash
71.plot: Anjali is stuck in ice and recalls her childhood. Sameer and Roongta try to contact the rescue team but get no response. Shikha remembers the old days with Akash and Gaurav. She tells Gaurav to not worry about Akash as he will be fine.

72.title: Arjun Is Found Missing
72.plot: The Colonel informs Sameer that Arjun is missing. Later, Lisa and Dr. Balan inform Sameer that Arjun may require immediate medical attention.

73.title: Colonel and Team Rescue Arjun
73.plot: Stuck in ice, Arjun almost abandons all hope but Colonel Abhyankar and his team rescue Arjun and dig him out of the ice. Will Colonel Abhyankar and his rescue team be able to reach Nasir?

74.title: Sarita hears news about the team
74.plot: Rena informs Mr. Roongta that their channel needs additional funds to telecast the Everest expedition. Meanwhile, Sarita is relieved after watching the news about the status of Colonel Abhyankar and his rescue team after the avalanche.

75.title: Colonel Tries to Motivate Nasir
75.plot: Chaand informs his teammates that the oxygen level will be low at camp three and presents them with the option to turn back. Meanwhile, Nasir is devastated as his teammate Lakpa dies.

76.title: Aakash apologises to Anjali
76.plot: Sameer informs Aakash that the hospital is taking legal action against Shikha. Aakash threatens to lodge a case against Mr. Roongta for breaking the contract. He then apologizes to Anjali for his mistake.

77.title: Sarita is miserable
77.plot: Rena asks her associate to gather information about the crown. Meanwhile, Vidhan and Maithili express their feelings to each other. Later, Sarita shares her miseries with Maithili.

78.title: Colonel Tries to Motivate Nasir
78.plot: Colonel Abhyankar tries to motivate Nasir and asks him not to sleep. On Aakash's request, Sameer informs Shikha that Mr. Roongta will be footing the hospital bills.

79.title: Tashi Tells a Story
79.plot: Colonel Abhyankar dreams about Tara. Roongta asks for an extension from the Board but his request is turned down. Tashi narrates a story of a king and his lady love. Through his story, he tries to motivate everyone to keep moving forward.

80.title: Akash-Anjali Discuss Destiny
80.plot: Colonel Abhyankar manages to escape a disastrous fall off the cliff with Arjun's help. Sameer tells him that he wonders if their mission is jinxed. Akash and Anjali deliberate over their destiny.

81.title: Will Sarita confront Jagat?
81.plot: Arjun and Chand ask the Colonel to return to the base camp as his health worsens but he refuses. Akash asks Anjali to stop doubting Arjun. Vijaya informs Sarita that Jagat had asked Vidhan to step back from the marriage.

82.title: Anjali Finds Nasir
82.plot: The rescue team heads to find Nasir. Rena confronts Roongta regarding the Sarpech and his conspiracy. Anjali finds Nasir lying in a cave. The team tries to wake him up but gets no response. Is Nasir alive?

83.title: Jagat Is Proud of Anjali
83.plot: Anjali's diligent efforts help Nasir regain consciousness. Akash informs Sameer about his recovery. The Army General praises Anjali's bravery in front of Jagat. Anjali tells Akash that she would miss the mission.

84.title: Anjali Heads Towards the Everest
84.plot: The Colonel decides to go ahead towards Everest with the rescue team and Anjali. Nasir thanks the rescue team for saving his life and specially thanks Anjali. Jagat and Sarita are overwhelmed knowing that Anjali is heading towards Everest.

85.title: Sameer Wants the Team to Retreat
85.plot: Roongta speaks to his daughter over the phone. She tells him that Anjali inspires her the most. Sameer tries to stop the rescue team from going ahead upon learning that their oxygen supply is less.

86.title: Abhyankar's Furious at Arjun
86.plot: The Colonel informs Chaand that he will not let Arjun, Aakash and Anjali go alone to climb the Everest.Later,Colonel refuses to allow Arjun to move ahead without oxygen supply and then confronts him for his behavior towards his team.

87.title: Abhyakar Can't Move On
87.plot: Colonel Abhyankar informs Sameer that five climbers will go ahead for the summit. Chaand is worried learning that Colonel is injured. Colonel Abhyankar tells Aakash that he will not be able to continue due to less oxygen supply.

88.title: Arjun Goes Missing
88.plot: Sameer warns Colonel Abhyankar about an approaching storm. Upon finding Arjun missing, Chaand believes that he might have gone ahead of them.

89.title: Shikha confronts Seema
89.plot: Rena is dejected about being unable to locate Arjun. The Colonel informs Sameer that they have found Arjun and asks Chaand to inform Aakash to get oxygen cylinders for them. Anjali informs Rena about Arjun's ill health.

90.title: Arjun Won't Climb Everest!
90.plot: Sameer informs Mr. Roongta that Aakash is moving towards Colonel Abhyankar with the oxygen cylinder. Arjun apologizes to Colonel Abhyankar and informs Mr. Roongta that he will not carry on with the summit.

91.title: Roongta threatens Arjun
91.plot: Roongta threatens Arjun of ruining his career. He asks Rena to convince Arjun to climb the Everest. The Colonel apologizes to Anjali as he decides to cancel their Everest mission.

imdb.plot outline: A young girl aspires to conquer her own personal Everest - of getting her father's love and respect. At the age of 21, she is faced with the biggest conflict of her life and is forced to question her very own existence. To redeem herself and find a place in her father's heart she decides to fulfill her father's unfulfilled dream - to summit the greatest and highest of all mountains, Mt Everest.
imdb.title: Everest
plot: A 21 year old girl tries to scale Mount _Everest_ (qv) in order to win her father's affection.

A young girl aspires to conquer her own personal _Everest_ (qv) - of getting her father's love and respect. At the age of 21, she is faced with the biggest conflict of her life and is forced to question her very own existence. To redeem herself and find a place in her father's heart she decides to fulfill her father's unfulfilled dream - to summit the greatest and highest of all mountains, Mt _Everest_ (qv).::Star Plus
